txt.en: 'No more, Karazgar!'
Make your way through the tunnel to the Skarháld throne room
'Karazgar did all this... on his own....'
Talk to Kámat in the throne room
'What is going on here?'
'You do not have the means to stop me, dwarf.'
'Do not be fooled by appearances, Karazgar.'
DNT - Blah!
'Look around you!'
'And my business is with all of Middle-earth.'
Kámat has been seriously wounded and is near death.
'I do not need the Frost-horde to fulfil my promise!'
'Gandalf!'
'Your Master is gone.'
'Go back inside, old man. My business here is with dwarves.'
'You will get nothing from us, Karazgar, save death!'
'Sauron I might have feared, but you are not Sauron.'
DNT - Blah!
'I am not afraid of Wizards. Your body will bleed like any other!'
'Longbeards! Zhélruka! Attack!'
'You are one servant of the Dark Lord. One servant only.'
Karazgar has cut a swath of destruction through the Dwarves of Skarháld, but you may still have a chance to stop him.
'I am greater than Sauron!'
'He flees, but his mask remains.'
'You came to this place with demands, Karazgar, and with promises.'
'Karazgar is wounded, but still... he overmatched us....\n\n'He left... the keep....'
The tunnel behind Skarháld has been cleared by an unknown interloper. Can it be that Karazgar has come to fulfil his promise?
Karazgar has come to Skarháld in fulfilment of his second promise.
'What weapons do you think to wield against me?'
'Well, I too made a promise.'
Karazgar has escaped, but he left his mask behind.
'That staff? That... book?'
'I promised to defend Middle-earth against Sauron and all his servants.'
'That book is from Mordor. Give it to me!'
'DNT - Blah!'
Gandalf awaits the mask of Karazgar.

'This mask is a relic of power, an artifact of great evil. It is not safe for any others to hold it for long. In my care, however, it will be safe.\n\n'Karazgar has been defeated, for now. We must discuss what should be done next, for he has revealed to us something most peculiar: his desire to possess the Black Book of Mordor.'
The mask is cold to the touch
'DNT - Blah!'
'[placeholder]! I've been looking everywhere for you!'
The Dwarves of Skarháld are in danger! You must hurry through the escape tunnel carved behind the fortress if you are to reach them before it is too late!
'Follow me! Durin is in danger!'
Frenzied Bat
A Zhélruka warrior lies face-down in the tunnel. He is dead.
Karazgar has left the keep. If you hurry you might still be able to save some of the Dwarves of Skarháld.
A pitched battle was fought in the throne room only recently
Kámat breathes his last
Karazgar's Mask
'And now I will keep that promise!'
'[placeholder]....'
'You are defeated, Karazgar.'
'Touch it not, Durin!'
'[placeholder], bring the mask of Karazgar to me.'
'It was... Karazgar....'
'I demand you give me that book at once!'
'Give me the book and I will go, Wizard! I will never return!'
An aura of terrible evil emanates from the mask of Karazgar.
'I will abandon my claim to this land! Just give me that book!'
Hurry to the exit of the keep and you may still save some lives
Find and confront Karazgar
Stand with Gandalf in defence of the Dwarves of Skarháld
Pick up the mask of Karazgar
Bring the mask of Karazgar to Gandalf
'He got away from us, the coward.'
Rust-sick Claw
Instance: A Promise Kept
